mapper.select: select order_code, member_code, member_id, order_date, cancel_date, payment_amount, payment_state, cancel_state, delivery_code, buy_confirm_state, recipient, zipCode, address, detail_address, tel, product_code, product_name, style_code, `size`, color, order_count, product_main_image from vw_myOrderData where member_id=#{memberId};

select order_code, member_code, member_id, order_date, cancel_date, payment_amount, payment_state, cancel_state, delivery_code, buy_confirm_state, recipient, zipCode, address, detail_address, tel, product_code, product_name, style_code, `size`, color, order_count, product_main_image from vw_myOrderData where order_code=#{orderCode};

select R1.* FROM( select order_code, member_code, member_id, order_date, cancel_date, payment_amount, payment_state, cancel_state, delivery_code, buy_confirm_state, recipient, zipCode, address, detail_address, tel, product_code, product_name, style_code, `size`, color, order_count, product_main_image from vw_myOrderData where member_id=#{memberId} and cancel_state is false order by order_date desc )R1 LIMIT #{pageSearch}, #{cntPerPage };
select count(*) from vw_myOrderData where member_id=#{memberId} and cancel_state is false ;

select R1.* FROM( select order_code, member_code, member_id, order_date, cancel_date, payment_amount, payment_state, cancel_state, delivery_code, buy_confirm_state, recipient, zipCode, address, detail_address, tel, product_code, product_name, style_code, `size`, color, order_count, product_main_image from vw_myOrderData where member_id=#{memberId} and cancel_state is true order by order_date desc )R1 LIMIT #{pageSearch}, #{cntPerPage };
select count(*) from vw_myOrderData where member_id=#{memberId} and cancel_state is true ;

select * from vw_myOrderData where order_code > 0
order by order_code desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(order_code) from vw_myOrderData where order_code > 0
